詩意: This hexagram represents a blessing in disguise. Everything is auspicious.
解曰: Intentional change. Enron in the end. If you ask about the use. Only close to noble people.
籤詩故事一:
◇Book recommendation Jiang Wei (Book recommendation Jiang Wei)
Jiang Wei (202-264), courtesy name Boyue, was a native of Ji County, Tianshui County, Liangzhou (now Gangu County, Tianshui City, Gansu Province).
During the Three Kingdoms period, Kong Ming led his troops from Qishan Mountain six times to attack Cao Wei. Kong Ming was seriously ill and was in critical condition. He taught the twenty-four chapters of the Book of War to the general Jiang Wei, hoping that he could inherit his legacy.
(The metaphor of this story is that Jiang Wei was inherited for some reason)
聖意:
Good luck to the family.
Self-successful.
Seeking wealth Yes.
Transaction completed.
Marriage.
Rokko Male.
Pedestrians haven’t arrived yet.
Tiancan Zhongping.


Six animals: Zhongping.

古人: Book Recommendations to Jiang Wei (Books to Jiang Wei)
